lead_paragraph: Mr. Lubasch, who wrote about a multitude of federal trials, worked at The New York Times for more than 30 years.

headline.print_headline: Arnold Lubasch, 83, Writer on Crime and Courts Beat
headline.main: Arnold Lubasch, Who Covered Crime for The Times, Dies at 83

snippet: Mr. Lubasch, who wrote about a multitude of federal trials, worked at The New York Times for more than 30 years.
abstract: Arnold H Lubasch, whose crime coverage for The New York Times over more than three decades included trial of Mafia leader John Gotti, and who later wrote biography of actor and civil rights activist Paul Robeson, dies at age 83.
